actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1285.

official_title: A Resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of S.50.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1285) Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 50 (Full employment), provided that the following provisions are deleted: (1) that portion of the bill which would revise the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974; (2) that section which would include new matters in the Economic Report of the President causing intrusion into and duplication of the jurisdiction of the standing committees of Congress; (3) those provisions which would revise the existing relationships between certain Committees; and (4) those provisions which amend existing congressional rules and procedure concerning votes in favor of unemployment and inflation goals.

titles.title: A Resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of S.50.
